jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Strengthened a core library of platform-wide components for easy reusability and uniformed brand identity
Clarified legacy code and documentation, increasing productivity and readability of codebase
Reduced clicks by 70% on our internal ticket system, allowing for SLA enforcement and on-demand reporting
Boosted user engagement by 30% by creating internal and external widgets for visualizing client data

jobs.title: Software Engineer
details: Overhauled department’s promotional process by developing a web application using React and Redux to automate data retrieval and document creation, saving 15 hours per nominee.
Scripted applications using Python frameworks (Pandas, Numpy) to clean and organize large data sets for data visualization platforms.
Reconciled financial data for 16 cost centers, reducing expenditures by 20% as a result of developing analytics platform using JavaScript and Tableau for manager’s decision making.
Optimized work-hour allocations for facilities management by redesigning application using Bootstrap, CSS3, and HTML5, leading to a decrease of underutilized hours.

jobs.title: Software QA Engineer
details: Facilitated software testing to provide feedback to developers as part of the software development cycle.
Expanded internal QA libraries with Python scripts that identified potential hazards to software deployment.
Streamlined the product-to-market pipeline by reproducing bugs and implementing preventative measures via Python scripts.
